channel.title: Problems after the upgrade on the 20th Oct
channel.description:
Just upgraded, and found 2 small problems.
1. The number pad located on the right side of the keyboard won't work.
2. Arm monitor on the gateway showed tor disconnected after the upgrade, and had to press "r" to reconnect.
Just to make sure if these are normal? :)

item.title: Problems after the upgrade on the 20th Oct
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
1. Dunno.

  2. When Tor receives an upgraded (by Debian or The Tor Project repositories) then it is restarted as part of the upgrade process. Arm loosing connection is expected then.

Read full topic
item.source: Problems after the upgrade on the 20th Oct
